attributes.action: Strengthen the Domestic violence rules for UK visa route to minimize the abuse
attributes.additional_details:
Increasing number of individuals making a false domestic violence claims to obtain indefinite leave to remain (ILR). 
Current system is being misused, undermining both the integrity of immigration policies and the experiences of real victims.
loopholes are being used to claim  DV claims
Impact on citizens falsely accused of DV. Stigma, financial loss, emotional distress, irreparable damage to their personal and professional lives. Current system lacks fairness, accountability, and integrity
attributes.background: Strengthen the assessment process for DV claims. Ensure a  verifiable evidence to prevent false claims. Implementing consequences for individuals found to have made fraudulent allegations to deter misuse. Protection for UK Citizens Facing False Allegations  End exemptions (financial and other tests
